column4: hi guys, can i install ubuntu using software-raid? in the partitioning stage there's no software raid
should it be a desktop cd or server?
then it should be the desktop
is there any way i can know that i'm downloading the correct cd from the filename of the iso?
go to http://www.ubuntu.com and download the alternative CD
then you know you havce the correct one
it gives me this: ftp://dl2.foss-id.web.id/iso/ubuntu/releases/hardy/ubuntu-8.04.1-server-i386.iso is the alternate the same as server?
i've checked the 'alternate cd' option and gives me that link
see the little check box that says Check here if you need the alternate desktop - make sure it's checked
make sure the "which ubuntu release" options is Ubuntu 8.04 desktop
